data.lyric:
[ti:After Dark (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake/Static Major/Ty Dolla $ign / Static Major / Ty Dolla $ign]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.43]After Dark (Explicit) - Drake/Static Major/Ty Dolla $ign
[00:01.19]Producer：Static Major/Noah 40 Shebib
[00:01.39]Static Major：
[00:02.44]Haha haha
[00:05.19]Yeah ayy after dark
[00:14.45]Drake/Static Major：
[00:15.01]In a whip so low
[00:17.26]No one's gotta know after dark
[00:22.47]Knockin' at your door
[00:24.07]I don't gotta work anymore after dark
[00:29.19]You can
[00:30.82]Put your phone down you're gonna need two hands after dark
[00:35.66]You can't get enough
[00:37.51]Girl you know I set it up for after dark
[00:40.77]Drake/Static Major：
[00:41.33]Late night like Left Eye I'm creepin'
[00:46.06]Assuming the worst 'cause I haven't heard from you all weekend
[00:52.80]Your silence is drivin' me up the wall up the wall
[00:59.71]I cannot tell if you're duckin' calls or missin' calls
[01:05.14]'Cause you've been so patient
[01:09.56]I drink on the job and smoke on the job
[01:12.72]So I don't know how serious you take it
[01:16.31]Can't offer much more you've heard it before
[01:19.70]That narrative for me isn't changin'
[01:23.51]I wanna make you a priority
[01:26.69]I wanna let you know there's more to me
[01:29.93]I wanna have your faith restored in me
[01:33.16]I'll be on my way after dark
[01:35.49]Drake/Static Major/Ty Dolla $ign：
[01:36.16]In a whip so low no one's gotta know
[01:40.14]No one's gotta know after dark
[01:43.60]Knockin' at your door I don't gotta work anymore
[01:47.00]I don't gotta work no more after dark
[01:50.32]You can put your phone down you're gonna need two hands
[01:54.94]Ooh yeah ooh yeah after dark
[01:56.60]You can't get enough
[01:58.60]Girl you know I set it up for after dark
[02:02.01]Ty Dolla $ign：
[02:02.58]Late night me and you got you wet like the pool
[02:05.10]Then I'm tryna dive in put some time in yeah
[02:08.92]Get the vibe right get your mind right
[02:12.01]It's gon' be a long night ooh yeah
[02:16.09]Put your feet in this water don't wanna get your hair wet
[02:19.74]We've hooked up a couple times we ain't took it there yet
[02:23.03]You broke up with your man and ain't been with nobody else
[02:26.37]You like f**k these n**gas rather keep it to yourself
[02:30.16]He did you wrong he left you down bad
[02:33.54]Now you can't trust nobody
[02:35.27]You said do anything but just don't lie to me
[02:39.17]I said I ride for you girl you said you ride for me
[02:42.10]Umm pulled up to the shorty we got Ghosts
[02:47.74]And when it's after dark then we can coast
[02:49.58]Drake/Static Major/Ty Dolla $ign：
[02:50.24]In a whip so low no one's gotta know
[02:54.29]No one's gotta know after dark
[02:57.91]Knockin' at your door I don't gotta work anymore
[03:01.38]I don't gotta work no more after dark
[03:04.70]You can put your phone down you're gonna need two hands
[03:09.05]Ooh yeah after dark
[03:11.13]You can't get enough
[03:12.96]Girl you know I set it up for after dark
[03:17.05]Al Wood：
[03:57.09]93.7 WBLK at the Quiet Storm
[04:01.40]Taking you right there with Hall & Oates
[04:03.84]Moving you through the storm in what is now
[04:07.03]19 minutes after 10 o'clock
[04:08.82]Thanks for your phone calls
[04:10.06]As we get you closer to your requests and dedications
[04:13.44]Phone lines are open for you to send a love your love note dedications
[04:16.76]644-9393 call me
[04:20.83]Coming up
[04:21.27]We will head through your storm with Troop Fantasia Chaka Khan
[04:26.26]My Funny Valentine Jill Scott giving you whatever
[04:30.01]And more the selected music of Mr Luther Vandross
[04:34.37]As we kick off your first hour of the most selective most seductive
[04:38.48]Most relaxing four hours of the 93-7
[04:42.02]It's Al Wood and you are safe soft and warm
[04:45.30]In the loving embrace of my storm on BLK
data.trans:
[ti:After Dark (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake/Static Major/Ty Dolla $ign / Static Major / Ty Dolla $ign]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.43]//
[00:01.19]//
[00:01.39]//
[00:02.44]//
[00:05.19]天黑之后
[00:14.45]//
[00:15.01]坐在慢悠悠的车里
[00:17.26]天黑之后 无人知晓
[00:22.47]敲响你的门
[00:24.07]天黑之后我就不必工作了
[00:29.19]你可以
[00:30.82]放下你的电话 天黑之后你就需要你的两只手了
[00:35.66]你就是不满足
[00:37.51]姑娘 你知道 我已经计划好天黑以后的活动了
[00:40.77]//
[00:41.33]深夜时分 我像左眼一样潜行
[00:46.06]做着最坏的打算 因为我已经一个星期没有你的消息
[00:52.80]你的沉默让我快要疯了 快要疯了
[00:59.71]我分不清你是故意不接电话还是错过了电话
[01:05.14]因为你从来都很有耐心的
[01:09.56]我在工作中喝酒 我在工作中抽烟
[01:12.72]所以我也不懂你有没有认真对待这一切
[01:16.31]我不能给你更多 你以前也听说过
[01:19.70]我还是别人口中的我
[01:23.51]我想让你做我生命中很重要的人
[01:26.69]我想让你了解更多的我
[01:29.93]我想让你重新燃起对我的信念
[01:33.16]天黑之后我就会上路了
[01:35.49]//
[01:36.16]坐在慢悠悠的车里 无人知晓
[01:40.14]天黑之后 无人知晓
[01:43.60]敲响你的门 我不必再工作了
[01:47.00]天黑之后 我就不必再工作了
[01:50.32]你可以放下你的电话 你会需要你的两只手
[01:54.94]天黑之后
[01:56.60]你就是不满足
[01:58.60]姑娘 你知道 我已经计划好天黑以后的活动了
[02:02.01]//
[02:02.58]深夜十分 只有你和我 我让你湿润得像泳池
[02:05.10]接着我就要潜入水中 好好享受
[02:08.92]营造合适的氛围 纠正你的思想
[02:12.01]这将是个漫长的夜晚
[02:16.09]你把脚放进水里 不想把头发弄湿
[02:19.74]我们约会过几次了 我们还不会到那一步
[02:23.03]你和你的男朋友分手 不和任何人在一起
[02:26.37]你说 让这些家伙都滚蛋 你宁愿自己一个人
[02:30.16]你真是犯了错 他让你失望透顶
[02:33.54]现在你谁也不信
[02:35.27]你说 随你做什么 就是别骗我
[02:39.17]我说 我愿意为你赴汤蹈火 你说 你也愿意为我赴汤蹈火
[02:42.10]追上了这个美女 我们有了灵魂
[02:47.74]当天黑以后 我们就可以慢慢滑行
[02:49.58]//
[02:50.24]坐在慢悠悠的车里 无人知晓
[02:54.29]天黑之后 无人知晓
[02:57.91]敲响你的门 我不必再工作了
[03:01.38]天黑之后 我就不必再工作了
[03:04.70]你可以放下你的电话 你会需要你的两只手
[03:09.05]天黑之后
[03:11.13]你就是不满足
[03:12.96]姑娘 你知道 我已经计划好天黑以后的活动了
[03:17.05]//
[03:57.09]93.7 WBLK正在播着《Quiet Storm》
[04:01.40]把你带回Hall & Oates的时代
[04:03.84]带你穿越风暴 现在几点
[04:07.03]十点十九分
[04:08.82]谢谢你打来电话
[04:10.06]我们就要帮你实践你的索取和奉献精神了
[04:13.44]电话随时可以拨打 你随时可以表达你的爱 表达你的奉献精神
[04:16.76]号码是644-9393 给我电话
[04:20.83]来了
[04:21.27]我们会跟Troop Fantasia和Chaka Khan一起穿越你制造的风暴 
[04:26.26]Funny Valentine Jill Scott会给你想要的一切
[04:30.01]还有很多卢瑟·范德鲁斯先生的精选音乐
[04:34.37]我们一起度过最美好最迷人的那一个小时
[04:38.48]听着93.7度过最轻松的四个小时
[04:42.02]他是Al Wood 你会很安全 很舒服 很温暖
[04:45.30]迎接BLK上我给你的爱情风暴吧
